activities.desc: Module Overview:This module will describe the basics of computation. You will identify the characteristics of a programming language and start defining the syntax and semantics of the python language. This module also illustrates the fundamental concepts required to write the code in python language. You will be knowing about the comments, operators etc and solve problems to get hands-on experience on these concepts.
recommendations: No pre-requistes for this learning objective
activities.title: Define algorithms

recommendations: No pre-requistes for this learning objective
activities.desc: Module Overview: In this module, you will combine the concepts you have learned so far with variables, branching and functions. It will introduce you to a key element called variables which is the basic building block of every program. You will know how to deal with decision making and the purpose of functions and how to implement  them in python language.
activities.title: Define abstraction

recommendations: No pre-requistes for this learning objective
activities.desc: Module Overview: In this module, you will combine the concepts you have learned so far with iteration. You will know how to deal with lines of code that must be executed multiple times. You will be introduced to the concept of loops and its characteristics. You will construct different loops for solving the problems.
activities.title: Construct algorithms, in english, to solve basic tasks

recommendations: No pre-requistes for this learning objective
activities.desc: Module Overview: This module is designed to reinforce your understanding about the basic concepts you have learned so far. There are a list of problem statements which needs you to pay more attention while solving.

activities.desc: Module Overview: This module will demonstrate what are exceptions and when to apply them while solving the problems. By the end of this module, you will be able to implement exceptional handling in the code. Just writing the code to solve a problem is not enough, you have to verify the code that it works perfectly in all the scenarios and contains no bugs.Here we will describe how to build the testsuite for testing the code.
